level.introtext: It's important to check whether the monitor is asleep. We need to turn on the changing color capabilities
level.endtext: Now you know all about variables!
level.code:
Variables can store either TRUE or FALSE. is_off = True You can use variables in expressions to create new variables: is_sleep = is_off You can also use a variable to redefine itself! current_color = 205 #How will we change the current_color for when the monitor changes color? current_color = current_color + 10
High school math is useless for programming. Order of operations is still true for Python programs!
the * symbol means multiplication and / means division math = 1+3/(4-1)
